deepDiveVideoContent.digDeeperInto:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the deep dive video section.
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Deep Dive Video Content.
**When Users See This**: When an exercise offers a deep dive video as part of the feedback.
**Technical Context**: `exerciseTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Dig Deeper into {exerciseTitle}!"
deepDiveVideoContent.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to continue from the deep dive video content.
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Deep Dive Video Content (footer button).
**When Users See This**: After viewing the deep dive video, to proceed with the feedback flow.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Continue"
feedbackContentButtons.goBackToEditor:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to navigate back to the editor.
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Footer button.
**When Users See This**: When a user wants to exit the feedback modal and return to the code editor.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Go back to editor"
